title.narrative: Decentralized Public Service and Financial Management Sector Development Program - Subprogram 1

description.narrative: The program seeks to improve public service delivery by supporting the development of efficient and accountable subnational administrations. The program comprises policy-based lending and project lending. In close alignment with the Government of Cambodia's subnational democratic development reforms, the program will (i) assist in the development of the policy and regulatory framework for decentralization, (ii) provide selected rural districts with offices for their operations, and (iii) contribute to the development of financial management capacity in central and subnational public administrations

participating-org.narrative: National Committee for Sub-National Democratic Development Secretariat

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: An efficient system of intergovernmental fiscal relations that assists service delivery by subnational administrations

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
By 2013: District/municipal fund is appropriated 0.8% of domestic revenues in the national budget (Baseline: 0% in 2012)

description.narrative: An efficient system of intergovernmental fiscal relations that assists service delivery by subnational administrations

title.narrative: Non-tax revenue collection by SNAs increases to 5% of general non-tax revenues (Baseline: 2.7% in 2008)

description.narrative: An efficient system of intergovernmental fiscal relations that assists service delivery by subnational administrations

title.narrative: By 2015: Provincial and district/municipal spending increases to 10% of total public expenditure (Baseline: 5.5% in 2008)

description.narrative: An efficient system of intergovernmental fiscal relations that assists service delivery by subnational administrations
